info.name: Duolingo - Red
info.description: A simple red theme for Duolingo that doesn't stray from the original design's elements. I am currently working on an option to change Duo's color. For now, please change it in the source code (instructions included).
info.additionalInfo:
v1.3: Removed blue from some links.

v1.2: Changed some links, working on an option to change Duo's color.

v1.0: Initial release.
